alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 07 at 9:14AM AKST until March 08 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Windy with heavy snow, blowing snow, and low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Freezing rain possible with a light glaze expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow accumulations and strongest winds are in the Bering Strait Coast. Conditions are much better at Teller and Brevig Mission. Conditions at St Lawrence Island are expected to improve late this afternoon. Conditions in the Bering Strait may improve briefly this afternoon but will get worse again this evening.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
